TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: Anime is cheap cartoons with 3fps.
Pokemon ripped off capsule monsters.
KSP is boring (Really sorry if it's said before)
Legend of Korra is puerile...
Stock aero is better than FAR.

The HD Simpsons episodes are way better than the crummy old fuzzy ones.

NASA are way behind ESA - they don't even have their own manned rockets anymore.
I thought Alan Shepard's geological work on the moon was second to none.
Manned spaceflight is wasteful and pointless, just like all space exploration.
EA makes the only good and should be the only ones that make games and call of duty is the best frachise ever
Half-Life 3 is confirmed, but it is being made by EA...And the Gravity Gun is DLC

Manned spaceflight is wasteful and pointless, just like all space exploration.
Oooh, that's harsh.

Rowling should have killed off Aragorn in the Red Wedding.
[insert comment that violates all rules of the KSP forum at the same time]

Mud is a horrible thing.

When, in reality, the first bacteria on Earth may have been born in something like it.
Supermarionation is stupid, Gerry Anderson's television shows are poorly made and their special effects are realy weak.

The only nice game EA made is Counter Strike.

If you don't get that one, wich you SHOULD GET IT, its because Valve made CS, not EA...

Except they didn't. (Which might have been your second sentence to annoy.)

Mod Making is Killing Gaming.

Valve should focus less on graphics and more on story on their next CoD...

I like intentionally confusing company names

Edited October 18, 2014 by SlimeCrusher
Squad should make all further updates DLCs...

Science > Friendship > Magic.

And so it's fair, I'll offend myself as well.

"Aren't furries just fur coated scum buckets?"

THREE IN ONE.
Comic books are for children.
Bronies are nothing but over glorified furries.
KSP is an overrated boring game
I hear Half-Life 3 is due out tomorrow...

stuff
The comic sans...it burns.

As for my next one

"Hey show me how you hold your iPhone."

The twist at the end of Allegiant was so easy!!!!

Also:

Nico's an idiot; my least favourite character EVER.

As well as:

Minecraft is SUCH a ripoff of blockheads!
